mapper.update:
update consult_doctor_info
sys_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hospital = #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
practitionerCertificateNo = #{practitionerCertificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skill = #{skill,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grab_session = #{grabSession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_message = #{sendMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_differential_notification = #{receiveDifferentialNotification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update consult_doctor_info set open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},nonrealtime_status = #{nonrealtimeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sys_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update consult_doctor_info set sys_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital = #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, practitionerCertificateNo = #{practitionerCertificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill = #{skill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grab_session = #{grabSession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_message = #{sendMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_differential_notification = #{receiveDifferentialNotification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT su.id AS userId,su.name,su.login_name AS userLoginName,su.user_type AS userType,cdi.department,cdi.type,su.login_flag AS loginFlag,su.del_flag AS delFlag from consult_doctor_info cdi RIGHT JOIN sys_user su on su.id = cdi.sys_user_id where 1=1
and su.id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * from sys_user su left JOIN consult_doctor_info sdi on sdi.sys_user_id = su.id where (su.user_type = #{userType} or su.user_type = 'distributor') and del_flag ='0' ORDER BY sdi.department
SELECT * from sys_user su where su.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') and su.del_flag ='0'
mapper.insert: insert into consult_doctor_lecture (sys_doctor_id, topics,link, lectureTime) values (#{userId}, #{topics},#{link},#{lectureTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * from consult_doctor_info where star_doctor = '1' order by sort,name
